segments.text: What do you do in summer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love going out into the countryside for walks or bike ride . I love being out in the fresh summer air . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t often go for walks , but I either play sports outside-you know , tennis or badminton-or just sit in the sunshine and read a good book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you do in winter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I play sports indoors quite often . If I ’ m feeling lazy , I just watch a film at home . I prefer summer to winter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think most people do . I like wearing nice , colorful clothes in summer , you know , a nice dress or skirt . It ’ s too cold for those kinds of clothes in winter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I like wearing shorts in summer . My legs would freeze !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think we ’ ll have a nice summer this year ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks to global warming , it could be hotter than ever !
segments.speaker: S1
